title: Corinne's Anzac Biscuits
ingredients: ['110g butter', '2 tablespoons golden syrup (be generous if you like them softer)', '2 tablespoons treacle (be generous if you like them softer)', '80g rolled oats', '60g unprocessed wheat bran', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '60g wholemeal flour', '1 1/2 Weetabix biscuits', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt']
